author: hussein alaraji
comment: Why i cant pay by the app. When i choose Trop up i have just one choice  (vikings points)

reply.author: Unleashed
reply.content:
Hi,

When you would like to use the VikingApp in order to top up, you need to have an active easy payment or Vikingpoints. Hello hussein

You can set up and configure an Easy Payment (automatic topup) via following link:
https://mobilevikings.be/en/my-viking/settings/payment/add-auto-sms-topup/

Viking Regards
Melissa

author: Mahammed Zishan Khan
comment: Can't top up, only allows vikingpoints, should allow paypal, bancontact,...

reply.author: Unleashed
reply.content:
Hi Mahammed

When you want to top up with the VikingApp, you need to have an active easy payment. Hello Mahammed,

You can either create a direct debit mandate, or link your MasterCard or Visa. You can set up your Easy Payment method through the link below: 

https://vikingco.com/en/my-viking/settings/payment/add-auto-sms-topup/

Viking Regards
...

author: Kristof De Corte
comment: Zeer handige app.

reply.author: Unleashed
reply.content:
Hallo Kristof,

Bedankt voor het compliment! 
Het kan zijn dat de app soms moeite heeft om alle contacten te synchroniseren. Je kan altijd eens afmelden, de app volledig sluiten en terug opstarten en dan opnieuw aanmelden. Laat de app dan enkele minuten open staan en normaal worden de contacten dan op de achtergrond ingeladen! :-O

Viking groet,...

author: Toon Vermeulen
comment: Kan alleen maar Herladen met viking punten

reply.author: Unleashed
reply.content:
Hoi Toon,
Via de Viking App kan je enkel herladen als je Viking Punten hebt of als je een Easy Payment hebt ingesteld. Je kan de Easy Payment instellen op onze website: "Mijn viking" - "Instellingen" - "Instellingen simkaart" of via deze link: https://vikingco.com/nl/my-viking/settings/sims/ 
Als dat gebeurd is, kan je wel herladen via de Viking...

Thank you for your feedback. But unfortunately this is not possible. 

Viking regards,
Robby

author: Ionuț Iustin Radu
comment: I like viking app work very well, but if you don't have internet the app and viking site doesn't work. Maybe can fix this. If I don't have connection on internet how to change. Need to make something to work your website only.

Hello Viking,

Our Viking App only works when you have a Mobile Vikings SIM card in the device. If not, you can't log into the Viking App.

Viking regards,
Robby

author: Sara Goossens
comment: What I'm missing:  - possibility to top up in app (with money, please don't start with the viking points and easy payment ...) - amount of messages and mobile internet left when your bundle has expired. Now it only shows calling minutes but that's the one thing I don't use. Other than that it does what I need it for: showing me how much mobile internet I have left in my bundle.

reply.author: Unleashed
reply.content: Hey Sara, it is indeed only possible to top-up with viking points or via easy payment with the app at this moment. There are no plans to change this, but it could be possible that extra payment methods will be added in the app. When a bundle is expired, you don't have any free messages or internet, so that is why we only show how much credit you...

Hello Ana,

You can only use the Viking to top up if you have Viking Points or an Easy Payment. 
Do you have one of these?

This way, we can have a look at your issue and hopefully resolve it quickly!

Viking regards,
Robby

title: Thanks

author: Nathan Van Laere
comment: 1 opmerking: ik heb 4+2+2 GB per maand. neen, ik heb 8 GB!! zo'n cirkeltje dat afneemt dient om te zien of ik goed bezig ben, maar als ik van 6,01 naar 5,99 GB ga dan verspringt de schaal van 8 GB naar 6 GB. zelfde bij 4GB. dus van 6,01/8 gevuld gaat de cirkel naar 5,99/6 gevuld. fixen plz. ***reactie op antwoord: vanuit het klant-perspectief heeft het toch geen nut om gescheiden bundels te hebben?  en 't is niet omdat het makkelijker is dat het per sé een goed idee is he.

reply.author: Unleashed
reply.content:
Hallo Nathan,

Dat is inderdaad vervelend, maar het is de makkelijkste manier voor ons systeem om de databundels weer te geven. 
Zo blijven de bundels ook gescheiden en zie je hoeveel er nog van elke bundel over blijft.

Viking groet,
Robby

author: Mala Max
comment: To anyone else who's had topup problems like I did.. There was an update yet to be installed that didn't happen automatically which replaced my app with an entirely new one (giant wtf-moment MV, just sayin') which let me topup again instantly after reentering my credentials.
title: Top up problem is easily fixed..
